text: Under Suspicion is a 1930 American pre-Code drama film directed by A. F. Erickson and starring J. Harold Murray and Lois Moran. It was produced and distributed by the Fox Film Corporation.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:Under Suspicion ==Cast== *J. Harold Murray - John Smith, aka Sir Robert Macklin *Lois Moran - Alice Freil *J. M. Kerrigan - Doyle *Marie Saxon - Suzanne *Lumsden Hare - Freil *George Brent - Inspector Turner *Erwin Connelly - Darby *Rhoda Cross - Marie *Vera Gerald - Ellen *Herbert Bunston - Major Manners ==References== ==External links== * * *poster Category:1930 films Category:Fox Film films Category:American aviation films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1930s action drama films Category:American action drama films Category:1930 drama films
title: Under Suspicion (1930 film)
